sentences.en: Despite these vague categories, one should not claim unequivocally that hostility between recognizable classes cannot be legitimately observed.
sentences.cn: 尽管存在这些模糊范畴，但我们不应该断然声称，在各个易于辨认出的阶层之间所存在的敌对态度就无法被合理地观察到。

sentences.en: She can now legitimately claim to be the best in the world.
sentences.cn: 现在她可以理所当然地声称自己是世界上最优秀的。

sentences.en: A question we can legitimately raise.
sentences.cn: 一个可以合理提出的问题。
